name: GEM motors, innovative electric motors, d.o.o.
goal:
GEM motors is an innovative Slovenian “startup” company dedicated to the development of high-tech electromagnetic drives for electric vehicles. It is a member of Ljubljana University Incubator and collaborates with various research institutions and partners in the field of electric drives.

Based on three years of research and development, the company in 2013 presented an innovative multi-phase electric motor with permanent magnets, which is built into the wheel, and operates on the basis of patent pending modular technology.

GEM motors’ distinguished working principles:

Innovation
Speed ​​and flexibility
High quality and professionalism
Creativity
Respect and protection of the natural environment
High-Tech development
Sustainable development

The company’s mission is to offer new, innovative and high-tech electromagnetic in-wheel drives for electric vehicles that are environmentally friendly and attractive for the end-user.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Transport
euInitiatives: Policy activity: Research and innovation; Energy; Climate change; Transport; Internal market; Industry, entrepreneurship and SMEs
